Message.Title: YAHOO MESSAGE BOARDS - IT'S NOT THE FORMAT; IT'S THE CONTENT!
Message.Msg: The clueless employees at Yahoo are scrambling to fix the format of these boards. That isn't the problem; it is the content. Yahoo employees - or select volunteers - need to have the power to do the following within seconds of any post: -Delete all political posts. They don't belong here. Yahoo can easily iset up a separate political board of it chooses. -Delete all post with URL's leading to phoney stock videos, news letters and other scams designed to steal from Yahoo users and advertisers. Report the posters including those who bump those posts with favorable comments to have their ID's permanently blocked. Yahoo should not be a home to thieves. -Delete all posts predicting future prices unless accompanied by reasoned arguments. -Delete all nonsense posts - groups of meaningless letters etc. Of course, this will reduce the number of posts by 90%, but at least those that remain will be useful to those actually interested in the companies under discussion. Just my opinion.
